snippet.title: Postknight - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Postknight — a pocket-sized delivery adventure!

In this RPG for those on-the-go, step into the shoes of a postknight and uphold the motto of delivering anything, to anywhere!

Mail bag? Checked.
Sword and upgrades? Checked.
Friends you have yet to meet? Checked.
Exciting delivery adventures? Triple-checked.

Postknight on App Store: http://bit.ly/pk-appstore
Postknight on Google Play: http://bit.ly/pk-play

Genre: RPG
Developed and published by: Kurechii 
Platform: Mobile (iOS & Android)
Price: Free

Official Site: http://postknight.com
Facebook: https://facebook.com/postknight
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayPostknight
Developer: http://kurechii.com
